Summary: Biochemical reaction from metoprolol to N-desisopropyl metoprolol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP2C9, CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from metoprolol to alpha-hydroxymetoprolol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9, CYP2B6, CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from metoprolol to o-demethylmetoprolol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP2B6, CYP2C9 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from o-demethylmetoprolol to metoprolol acid. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2D6.
